infos.value: Lord Adelard... Please forgive me.
What is it?
Even though the dissolution of the alliance took us by surprise, Rayches and I should have...
There was nothing you could have done.
Who could have predicted Lord Dario would fall?
Could it be the Fennes forces are being led by—?
It’s Melnia.
So it’s as I thought...
Hey, Brother. Who's Melnia?
You don’t know?
She is a woman to be feared, attended by her handmaid Ranell who trades in assassinations.
They say she is also Muraga’s closest advisor.
I suppose we shouldn’t expect a sheltered little girl like Salire to know that, though.
Excuse me? Are you trying to start a fight?
It wouldn’t be much of a fight. I’d have you sliced to bits before you even realized.
Hmph. Care to test that theory?
You wouldn’t even draw your katana before I burned you to a crisp.
Stop that, both of you.
We always assumed Melnia would only be used as a last resort...
This could only mean...that Fennes has decided to escalate this war.
Grahl, are you aware of where they’ve gone, now that Hourne Castle has fallen?
I’m afraid not...
I see. I suppose that’s to be expected. You were imprisoned in the dungeon, after all.
My apologies...
I thought we had a chance advancing on Fennes Castle while they were shorthanded, but...
Now it would appear our best option is to reconvene with King Robb and take down Muraga.
With that in mind, let us make haste.
